T02TD1294E:166a-1: he badzra sya ha sta bya bar kra ma n'a ma /
T02TD1294E:166a-3: dgyes pa rdo rje'i lag tu blang ba'i rim pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD1294E:166a-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1294E:166a-5: de la dang por bdag nyid sgrub pa po blo phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas bsam gtan gyi khang par zhugs shing /
T02TD1294E:166a-6: chos thams cad bdag med par mos te /
T02TD1294E:166a-9: de nas ci 'byor pa'i yo byad bsogs pa dang /
T02TD1294E:166a-12: dri chab la 'thor 'thung dang nye reg byas shing /
T02TD1294E:166a-13: aom he badzra aa tishth'a na ma ma raksha raksha h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1294E:166a-14: zhes brjod pas bdag la sogs pa bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1294E:166a-15: de nas stan bzang po la 'dug ste /
T02TD1294E:166b-0: @166b mchod pa'i yo byang rnams byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02TD1294E:166b-1: aom badzra pushpe aom a'a: h'um /
T02TD1294E:166b-2: aom badzra dh'u pe aom a'a: h'um /
T02TD1294E:166b-3: aom badzra a'a lo ke aom a'a: h'um /
T02TD1294E:166b-4: aom badzra gandhe aom a'a: h'um /
T02TD1294E:166b-5: aom badzra nee wi dye aom a'a: h'um zhes pas so //
T02TD1294E:166b-6: mchod rdzas gzhan dag ni aom a'a: h'um /
T02TD1294E:166b-7: zhes pas bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gis so //
T02TD1294E:166b-8: de nas rang gi snying ga'i h'um gi 'od kyis bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs te /
T02TD1294E:166b-9: h'um khyod ni rnal 'byor ma rnams bskor //
T02TD1294E:166b-10: rdo rje mi phyed cig bzhed pa //
T02TD1294E:166b-11: mchog tu dgyes pas gshegs nas kyang //
T02TD1294E:166b-12: byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1294E:166b-13: aom badzra goo r'i dza: aom badzra tsoo r'i h'um /
T02TD1294E:166b-14: aom badzra be t'a l'i bam /
T02TD1294E:166b-15: aom badzra ghasma r'i ho: zhes brjod pas mngon sum du gsal bar bltas la mchod par bya'o //
T02TD1294E:166b-16: chu dang thang las skyes pa yi //
T02TD1294E:166b-17: lha rdzas bzang po'i me tog 'di //
T02TD1294E:166b-18: gus pa mchog gis bdag 'bul na //
T02TD1294E:166b-19: ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol //
T02TD1294E:166b-20: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta pushpe p'u dza mi gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD1294E:166b-21: lha cig skyes dang sbyar ba yi //
T02TD1294E:166b-22: lha rdzas bzang po'i bdug spos 'di //
T02TD1294E:166b-23: gus pa mchog gis bdag 'bul na //
T02TD1294E:166b-24: ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol //
T02TD1294E:166b-25: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta dh'u pe p'u ja me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD1294E:166b-26: gdon rnams 'joms shing bkra shis la //
T02TD1294E:166b-27: dge zhing mun sel mar me 'di //
T02TD1294E:166b-28: gus pa mchog gis bdag 'bul na //
T02TD1294E:166b-29: ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol //
T02TD1294E:166b-30: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta a'a lo ke p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD1294E:166b-31: nags tshal bcud ni yid du 'ong //
T02TD1294E:166b-32: dri zhim sbyar ba lha yi chu //
T02TD1294E:166b-33: gus pa mchog gis bdag 'bul na //
T02TD1294E:166b-34: ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol //
T02TD1294E:166b-35: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta gandhe p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD1294E:166b-36: sman rnams bcud ni yid du 'ong //
T02TD1294E:166b-37: sngags kyi zhal zas bshos 'di dab //
T02TD1294E:166b-38: gus pa mchog gis bdag 'bul na //
T02TD1294E:166b-39: ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol //
T02TD1294E:166b-40: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ne wi tye pru dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD1294E:166b-41: de nas lha mo brgyad kyis mchod de //
T02TD1294E:166b-42: goo r'i ma ni ri bong 'dzin //
T02TD1294E:166b-43: tsoo r'i ma ni nyi ma 'dzin //
T02TD1294E:166b-44: be t'a l'i ni rdo rje chu //
T02TD1294E:166b-47: ri khrod ma ni sbrang rtsi 'dzin //
T02TD1294E:166b-48: gtum mo cang te'u'i sgra sgrogs shing //
T02TD1294E:167a-2: g-yung mos mgul pa nas 'khyud pa //
T02TD1294E:167a-3: skyes bu bzhin du byed par bshad //
T02TD1294E:167a-4: phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang //
T02TD1294E:167a-5: 'di rnams kyis ni gtso bo mchod //
T02TD1294E:167a-6: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nuta ra p'u dza me gha sa mu dras par /
T02TD1294E:167a-8: de nas bshags pa bya ste /
T02TD1294E:167a-9: bdag gi sdig pa bgyis pa dang //
T02TD1294E:167a-10: rjes su yi rang bgyid stsal gang //
T02TD1294E:167a-11: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar ni //
T02TD1294E:167a-12: thams cad ma lus so sor bshags //
T02TD1294E:167a-13: de nas rjes su yi rang ba byas te /
T02TD1294E:167a-14: sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams dang //
T02TD1294E:167a-15: 'phags pa nyan thos rang rgyal dang //
T02TD1294E:167a-16: so so'i skye bo'i bsod nams de //
T02TD1294E:167a-17: kun la rjes su yi rang ngo //
T02TD1294E:167a-18: de nas bsngo ba bya ste /
T02TD1294E:167a-19: bdag gi dge ba 'di dag kun //
T02TD1294E:167a-20: bla med byang chub yang dag rdzogs //
T02TD1294E:167a-21: sems can kun dang thun mong du //
T02TD1294E:167a-22: yongs su smin cing rdzogs par bgyi //
T02TD1294E:167a-23: de nas skyabs su gsol te /
T02TD1294E:167a-24: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog / de yis gsungs pa'i dam chos dang //
T02TD1294E:167a-25: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun la //
T02TD1294E:167a-26: byang chub bar du skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1294E:167a-27: de nas smon pa byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de /
T02TD1294E:167a-28: bdag gis bla med byang chub tu //
T02TD1294E:167a-29: yang dag rdzogs par gyur nas ni //
T02TD1294E:167a-30: sems can kun don phan bya'i phyir //
T02TD1294E:167a-31: mi gnas mya ngan 'das la dgod //
T02TD1294E:167a-32: de nas 'jug pa byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de /
T02TD1294E:167a-33: bdag gis sbyin pa la sogs pa //
T02TD1294E:167a-34: pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pas //
T02TD1294E:167a-35: rdo rje theg pa bla med pa'i //
T02TD1294E:167a-36: lan ni yang dag bsten par bya'o //
T02TD1294E:167a-37: de nas tshad med pa bzhi rim pa bzhin du bsgoms la /
T02TD1294E:167a-38: ye shes kyi tshogs stong pa'i byang chub tu bsams te /
T02TD1294E:167a-39: ra ba dang gur la sogs pa'i nang du 'byung bzhi yongs su gyur pa'i gzhal yas khang gru bzhi sgo khyung dang ldan pa'i nang du so so'i gdan dbus su bdud bzhi /
T02TD1294E:167a-47: nub byang du thags bzangs ris kyi steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams la /
T02TD1294E:167a-48: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa ni la ya badzra sva bh'a ba a'a tma ko& ham zhes brjod do //
T02TD1294E:167b-0: de nas de'i dbus su mngon par byang @167b chub pa rnam pa lnga /
T02TD1294E:167b-1: zla ba me long ye shes ldan //
T02TD1294E:167b-2: bdun gyi bdun pa mnyam nyid ldan //
T02TD1294E:167b-3: rang lha'i sa bon phyag mtshan ni //
T02TD1294E:167b-4: so sor rtog pa nyid du brjod //
T02TD1294E:167b-5: thams cad gcig gyur bya nan tan //
T02TD1294E:167b-6: rdzogs pa chos dbyings dag pa'o //
T02TD1294E:167b-7: zhes pas rgyu'i rdo rje 'chad sku mdog dkar po rig ma sngon mo dang bcas pa /
T02TD1294E:167b-8: zhal phyag bcu drug pa phyag rgya lnga dang thal chen gyis lus la brgyan pa bskyed la /
T02TD1294E:167b-9: gsang ba'i gnas padma su kha dha ra zhes pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1294E:167b-10: aom badzra ma h'a de shva la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs la //
T02TD1294E:167b-11: sim sim zhes pa la sogs pa'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bas bskyod la /
T02TD1294E:167b-12: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta au nu r'a ga na ba badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes pas rjes su chags pa'i zhu ba las /
T02TD1294E:167b-13: rjes su mthun pa'i mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lngas lha mo'i 'khor lo spro bar bya'o //
T02TD1294E:167b-14: de la goo ri'i ma ni shar gyi gdan gyi steng du sngar gyi bsod nams dang ye shes las a'a li k'a li ra snang la /
T02TD1294E:167b-15: de dag gyur pa las zla ba dang nyi ma ste mngon par byang chub pa gnyis pa'o //
T02TD1294E:167b-16: de dag gi nang du zhu bar gyur pa'i gham /
T02TD1294E:167b-17: zhags pa gri gug tu gyur /
T02TD1294E:167b-18: de la gham gis mtshan pa zla nyi'i steng du gnas pa ni byang chub pa gsum pa'o //
T02TD1294E:167b-19: de nas sa bon gham las 'od zer rnal 'byor ma'i rnam pa'i gzugs su byung ste /
T02TD1294E:167b-20: sems can thams cad kyi don byas nas slar bsdus pas nyi zla la sogs pa zhu ba ni byang chub pa bzhi pa'o //
T02TD1294E:167b-21: de la goo r'i'i gzugs sku mdog nag po drag chen mo la sogs pa rdzogs pa ni byang chub pa lnga pa'o //
T02TD1294E:167b-22: de bzhin du tsoo r'i la sogs pa gzhan dag la yang sbyar ro //
T02TD1294E:167b-23: de ltar 'khor bskyed pa'i bya ba rdzogs pa dang /
T02TD1294E:167b-24: de'i dbus su gtso bo rgyus 'gyur ba ni srid pa bar do //
T02TD1294E:167b-25: yi ge aom a'a: h'um ho dmar po gnyis kyi bar du bcug pa srid pa par do dri za nye bar 'khor gyi tshul du gnas pa ste /
T02TD1294E:167b-26: dga' ldan de'i zhal du zhugs pas padma'i mtha' ru chags shing zhu bas dran pa dang ldan par gyur te /
T02TD1294E:167b-27: de nyid kyi tshe gtso bo rig ma dang bcas par yang zhu bar gyur to //
T02TD1294E:167b-28: de ltar rgyu rdzogs nas rkyen glus bskul ba ni /
T02TD1294E:167b-29: grva bzhin gnas pa'i lha mo bzhis bskul ba'i las byed pas na /
T02TD1294E:168a-0: byams pa la sogs pa'i glu bzhi @168a * //
T02TD1294E:168a-2: bzhengs shig rje btsun snying rje'i yid //
T02TD1294E:168a-3: pukka s'i ni bdag la skyobs //
T02TD1294E:168a-4: stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la //
T02TD1294E:168a-5: bdag la bde chen sbyor bzhed mdzod //
T02TD1294E:168a-6: khyod mi bzhugs na bdag 'gum pas //
T02TD1294E:168a-7: dgyes pa'i rdo rje khyod bzhengs shig / stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la //
T02TD1294E:168a-8: ri khrod ma 'bras grub par mdzod //
T02TD1294E:168a-9: dga' gtso 'jig rten mgron gnyer nas //
T02TD1294E:168a-10: stong pa nyid la bzhugs sam ci //
T02TD1294E:168a-11: khyod med phyogs ni mi 'tshal bas //
T02TD1294E:168a-12: gdol ba mo bdag zhu ba bgyid //
T02TD1294E:168a-13: bdag gis khyod kyi thugs 'tshal gyis //
T02TD1294E:168a-14: mig 'phrul mnga' ba khyod bzhengs shig / g-yung mo bdag yid dran nyams pas //
T02TD1294E:168a-15: snying rje'i rgyun chad ma mdzad cig / ces pa'i rkyen gyis bskul bas //
T02TD1294E:168a-16: 'bras bu'i he ru ka yud tsam gyis mngon par byang chub pa lngas rdzus skyes dang chos mthun par bskyed par bya ste /
T02TD1294E:168a-18: gong bu gnyis su gyur te /
T02TD1294E:168a-19: gong bu gcig ni steng 'og gi nyi zla gnyis dang /
T02TD1294E:168a-20: bar du sa bon h'um las rdo rje gyur /
T02TD1294E:168a-21: de las sa bon gyis mtshan /
T02TD1294E:168a-22: de las 'od zer rnal 'byor ma'i gzugs spros bsdus pa las gcig tu gyur pa las sku mdog nag po la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur to //
T02TD1294E:168a-23: de bzhin du bdag med la la yang aom dang gri gug la sogs pa byang chub pa lnga las gyur to //
T02TD1294E:168a-24: de ma thag tu zhabs rnams kyi stang stabs la sogs pa gyur pa'i rjes la /
T02TD1294E:168a-25: dbus kyi gnas su dkyil 'khor gyi bdag por gyur to //
T02TD1294E:168a-26: de nas yang 'khor rnams kyi sku mdog dang /
T02TD1294E:168a-27: mtshan ma la sogs pa gsal bar byas pa dang /
T02TD1294E:168a-28: sems dpa' sum brtsegs bya ste /
T02TD1294E:168a-29: de la dpa' bo'i thugs kar pam las padma 'dab ma brgyad pa dang /
T02TD1294E:168a-30: ram las nyi ma'i steng du h'um las rdo rje'o //
T02TD1294E:168a-31: de la h'um gis mtshan par gyur pa las bskyed pa'i ye shes pa rang dang 'dra ba'o //
T02TD1294E:168a-32: de'i yang thugs kar padma dang nyi ma la h'um yongs su gyur pa'i /
T02TD1294E:168a-33: rdo rje la h'um gis mtshan pa'o //
T02TD1294E:168a-34: de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang h'um dang rdo rje sems dpa' sum brtsegs bya ba nyid do //
T02TD1294E:168a-35: de nas gtso bo'i ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' las /
T02TD1294E:168a-36: ye shes kyi 'khor lo mdun gyi nam mkhar spyan drangs te gsal ba de las byung ba'i yid kyis mchod pas mchod nas /
T02TD1294E:168b-0: @168b aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aanutta ra p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spa ra na ma ye h'um zhes brjod do //
T02TD1294E:168b-1: de nas rdo rje glu dang phyag rgyar bcas pas /
T02TD1294E:168b-2: aom badzra goo r'i badzra aam ku sha dza: aom badzra tsoo t'i badzra p'a sha h'um /
T02TD1294E:168b-3: aom badzra be t'a l'i badzra spho ta bam /
T02TD1294E:168b-4: aom badzra ghasma r'i badzra gha nde ho: zhes pas dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang /
T02TD1294E:168b-7: dam tshig gi 'khor lo dang dbyer med du gyur to //
T02TD1294E:168b-8: de nas dam tshig la ye shes kyi 'khor lo brten zhing nus pa bskyed pa'i don du lha kun gyi skye mched byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02TD1294E:168b-10: de la gtso bo'i mig la mam gyi sa bon no //
T02TD1294E:168b-11: de yang yongs su gyur pa las gti mug rdo rje ma gsal bar bsam zhing /
T02TD1294E:168b-12: mam mo ha badzri aom a'a: h'um zhes brjod do //
T02TD1294E:168b-13: rna par sa bon dam las zhe sdang rdo rje ma bsam zhing /
T02TD1294E:168b-14: dam dve sha badzri aom a'a: h'um zhes brjod do //
T02TD1294E:168b-15: sna la pam yongs su gyur pa las ser sna rdo rje ma bsam zhing /
T02TD1294E:168b-16: pam be shu na badzri aom a'a: h'um zhes brjod do //
T02TD1294E:168b-17: kha la ram yongs su gyur pa las /
T02TD1294E:168b-18: 'dod chags rdo rje ma bsam zhing /
T02TD1294E:168b-19: r'a ga badzra aom a'a: h'um zhes brjod do //
T02TD1294E:168b-20: lus la aom yongs su gyur pa las phrag rdog rdo rje ma bsam zhing /
T02TD1294E:168b-21: aom airashya badzra aom a'a: h'um zhes brjod do //
T02TD1294E:168b-22: snying gar yid la yang sa bon nam yongs su gyur pa las bdag med par bsam zhing /
T02TD1294E:168b-23: nam nee ra a'tama badzra aom a'a: h'um zhes brjod do //
T02TD1294E:168b-24: de bzhin du gtso bo'i snying ga dang /
T02TD1294E:168b-26: spyi bor aom a'a: h'um gi sa bon las /
T02TD1294E:168b-27: mkha' spyod sku'i rdo rje ma /
T02TD1294E:168b-28: sa spyod gsung gi rdo rje ma /
T02TD1294E:168b-29: zhabs 'og gnas pa zhugs kyi rdo rje mar gsal bar bskyed cing /
T02TD1294E:168b-30: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta khe tsa ri badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1294E:168b-31: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta bh'u tsa ri badzra sva bh'a ba a'tma ko& ham /
T02TD1294E:168b-32: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'a t'a la wa si ni badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1294E:168b-34: bzhin du lta kun la yang rim pa bzhin du sbyar ro //
T02TD1294E:168b-35: de nas gtso bo'i thugs ka nas byung ba'i 'od zer gyis mdun gyi nam mkhar byang chub sems dpa' thams cad spyan drangs la /
T02TD1294E:168b-37: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nutta ra p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spa ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD1294E:168b-38: zhes brjod pas mnyes par gyur pa de las /
T02TD1294E:168b-39: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi shi nytsa tu mam /
T02TD1294E:169a-1: pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag dpal he ru ka zhal brgyad phyag bcu drug par gyur te /
T02TD1294E:169a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga zhu ba'i bum pas lha kun la dbang bskur nas /
T02TD1294E:169a-3: so sor rigs kyi bdag po dbul bskyed cing /
T02TD1294E:169a-4: me tog gi char la sogs pa byung ba dang /
T02TD1294E:169a-5: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aabhi she ka badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes brjod do //
T02TD1294E:169a-6: de nas yang rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer las mchod pa'i lha mo'i tshogs spros nas bdag nyid gtso bo dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo la mchod de /
T02TD1294E:169a-7: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza badzra sva bh'a ba a'atama ko& ham zhes brjod do //
T02TD1294E:169a-9: thams cad dngos po'i rang bzhin mchog / ces bya ba la sogs pa 'am /
T02TD1294E:169a-10: khyod ni rnal 'byor ma rnams yongs su bskor //
T02TD1294E:169a-11: zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'khor gyis gtso bo la bstod par bsam zhing /
T02TD1294E:169a-12: bdag nyid kyang glu blang zhing /
T02TD1294E:169a-13: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta pra stu te badzra sva bh'a ba a'tma ko& ham zhes brjod do //
T02TD1294E:169a-14: de nas bdud rtsi myang ba'i chog bya ste /
T02TD1294E:169a-15: bdag nyid gtso bo'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams rang gi ye shes kyi snang ba las gyur pa yin pas na rang dang tha mi dad pa'i nga rgyal bya'o //
T02TD1294E:169a-16: de nas rang gi mdun du 'jig rten pa'i g-yos byed pa'i tshul du kam yongs su gyur pa las thod pa gsum dang /
T02TD1294E:169a-18: de nas ram yongs su gyur pa'i me'i steng du /
T02TD1294E:169a-19: aa yongs su gyur pa'i thod pa'o //
T02TD1294E:169a-20: nang du bdud rtsi'i ri lu'am phye ma myos byed dang sbyar ba la /
T02TD1294E:169a-21: bi ra shu ma mu dang /
T02TD1294E:169a-22: go ku da ha na las bdud rtsi lnga dang /
T02TD1294E:169a-23: sgron ma lnga'i ngo bor gyur to //
T02TD1294E:169a-24: de'i steng du h'um yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rgya gram kha chod lta bur bsam mo //
T02TD1294E:169a-25: de nas rlung gis me bskyod pas thod par bdud rtsi dang sgron ma 'dres shing khol bas rlangs pa lta bu'i 'od zer byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas ye shes kyi bdud rtsi bkug ste /
T02TD1294E:169a-26: de rdo rje la thim pas zhu nas dam tshig gi bdud rtsi la thim zhing 'dres par gyur to //
T02TD1294E:169a-27: aom a'a: h'um zhes lan bdud nam nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod pas byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02TD1294E:169a-28: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha kun rang gi gtso bo ra gsal ba'i thugs kar bskyed cing dmigs pa'am /
T02TD1294E:169b-0: yang na rang nyid las gyur pa'i @169b 'od zer lta bu'i snang bar bsams te /

T02TD1294E:169b-12: gtum mo sbar ba la sogs bya //

T02TD1294E:169b-28: myur du byang chub 'thob ces pa ni /
T02TD1294E:169b-29: mchog tu gyur pa'i rten 'brel mthu //
T02TD1294E:169b-30: rdo rje sems dpa' mkhyen phyir ro //

T02TD1294E:169b-39: sgom dang spyod pa 'bras bu'i stobs //
T02TD1294E:169b-40: phyag rgyal sogs rim bzhin sbyar //

T02TD1294E:169b-49: rnal 'byor de yis ngal zhes pa ni /
T02TD1294E:169b-50: rim pa gnyis kyis ngal gyur na /

T02TD1294E:170a-1: nyid lha yi phung po dang //

T02TD1294E:170a-12: chu zla lta bur gyur pa'o //
T02TD1294E:170a-13: de la sngags kyi bzlas pa yang //
T02TD1294E:170a-14: bdag nyid tshogs pa gcig gyur pas //
T02TD1294E:170a-15: sgra rings gsal ba khri 'bum bzlas //

T02TD1294E:170a-21: bdag nyid tshogs pa gcig gyur pas //

T02TD1294E:170a-36: yam las rlung dang ram las me //
T02TD1294E:170a-37: aa las thod par bdud rtsi bsam //
T02TD1294E:170a-38: bdud rtsi sgron ma'i sa bon las //
T02TD1294E:170a-39: rim bzhin bskol bas 'od zer byung //

T02TD1294E:170a-42: de la sngar gyi mgron rnams kyi //

T02TD1294E:170a-44: bdud rtsi ro ru gsal par byed //
T02TD1294E:170a-74: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rm'a n'am /

T02TD1294E:170a-76: gal te mtshan phyed tshogs 'khor lo //
T02TD1294E:170a-77: phyed na dbugs dbyung bzhi pa ste //
T02TD1294E:170b-0: gnyis 'og @170b gtor ma'i sngon du bya //
T02TD1294E:170b-1: dang por kun gyis khrus la 'jug / bdud rtsi lnga dang dri zhim byugs //
T02TD1294E:170b-2: gos bzang rus sogs rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02TD1294E:170b-3: so so'i mgo la me tog gzhag / yang na me tog phreng bas bcing //
T02TD1294E:170b-4: thig gdab le tsher bya ba dang //
T02TD1294E:170b-5: rang rang stan la bde bar 'dug / kun gyi rnal 'byor gsal ba ru //

T02TD1294E:170b-10: de nas dkyil 'khor lha rnams la //
T02TD1294E:170b-11: ba lim chen po'i gtor ma bstab //
T02TD1294E:170b-12: bza' dang btung ba'i phud bsdus la //
T02TD1294E:170b-13: lag tu thogs nas 'di skad brjod //
T02TD1294E:170b-14: aom badzra goo r'i ga na tsa kra aa dhi khshr'a na /
T02TD1294E:170b-15: zhes pa'i glu ni drug 'gyur du //
T02TD1294E:170b-16: lha mo brgyad po rim bzhin du //
T02TD1294E:170b-17: de ltar byin gyis brlab byas la //
T02TD1294E:170b-19: gtor chen bskyed gsum ldan par ni //

T02TD1294E:170b-39: so sor tshim par gyur nas kyang //
T02TD1294E:170b-40: rdo rje gar du glu blangs te //

T02TD1294E:170b-45: gzhan yang skad cig dga' ba'i glu //

T02TD1294E:170b-48: rnam pa sna tshogs skad cig ma //

T02TD1294E:170b-50: rnam pa sna tshogs du ma yi //
T02TD1294E:170b-51: sgeg dang dpa' la sogs pa rnams //
T02TD1294E:170b-52: rnam par smin pa'i skad cig ma /
T02TD1294E:171a-0: @171a * // mchog dga'i longs spyod rab tu 'bul //
T02TD1294E:171a-1: rnam pa sna tshogs du ma yi //
T02TD1294E:171a-2: bde ba'i ston mo la sogs pa'i //

T02TD1294E:171a-4: dga' bral longs spyod rab tu 'bul //
T02TD1294E:171a-5: rnam pa sna tshogs du ma yi //
T02TD1294E:171a-6: bde mchog chen po la sogs pa //
T02TD1294E:171a-7: mtshan nyid bral ba'i skad cig ma //

T02TD1294E:171a-13: zhes pa yis ni glu blangs la //
T02TD1294E:171a-15: tshogs kyi 'khor lo sngon nyid du //

T02TD1294E:171a-19: sngon du grangs dang mtshan ma'o //
T02TD1294E:171a-20: dus kyi bsnyen pas sbyang bar bya //
T02TD1294E:171a-22: de bzhin zla drug goms pa dang //
T02TD1294E:171a-23: sngags kyi rab mthong pha rol son //
T02TD1294E:171a-24: gsal bar nus pa'i rnal 'byor ro //
T02TD1294E:171a-25: der ni bsnyen pas mthu bskyed nas //
T02TD1294E:171a-26: sa yi cho ga brtag pa ni //
T02TD1294E:171a-27: phyi dang nang du shes par bya //
T02TD1294E:171a-28: phyi ni tshva sgo can la sogs //
T02TD1294E:171a-29: ngan pa'i skyon dag spang byas nas //
T02TD1294E:171a-30: grong khyer byang ngam shar du gzhol //
T02TD1294E:171a-31: mnyam la sogs pa'i yon tan ldan //
T02TD1294E:171a-32: nad ni mtshan ma rmi lam sogs //
T02TD1294E:171a-33: rnal 'byor nus pas rab tu brtag / sbyang ba de bzhin phyi dang nang //
T02TD1294E:171a-34: phyi ni 'dom gang lte ba dang //
T02TD1294E:171a-35: pus nub tsam du brko byas te //
T02TD1294E:171a-37: rdo dang gyo mo sol du ma bsal //

T02TD1294E:171a-45: yan lag drug po sngar bzhin bya //

T02TD1294E:171a-49: zhes sogs tshig gis dpang por gsol //

T02TD1294E:171a-51: slob dpon la ni grogs mchog gis //

T02TD1294E:172a-41: bdag nyid lhar gsal snying ga yi //
T02TD1294E:172a-43: de nas yi ge bhr'um du gyur //
T02TD1294E:172a-44: de las gzhal yas khang du gyur //
T02TD1294E:172a-45: kham gi yi ge dkar po las //
T02TD1294E:172a-46: bum pa'i nang ni stong par bsam //
T02TD1294E:172a-47: de nas bam yig dmar po las //
T02TD1294E:172a-49: re phas nyi ma'i gdan bsam bya //
T02TD1294E:172a-50: dbus su h'um las gtso bo ni //
T02TD1294E:172a-51: rig mar bcas pa gsal bar bskyed //
T02TD1294E:172a-52: gam tsam bam gham bzhi las ni //
T02TD1294E:172a-53: goo r'i la sogs phyogs su'o //
T02TD1294E:172a-54: pam sam lam dam bzhi po ni //
T02TD1294E:172a-55: yongs gyur mtshams su spos mo sogs //
T02TD1294E:172a-56: de nas ye shes 'khor lo yang //
T02TD1294E:172b-0: bdag nyid @172b gtso bo'i thugs ka nas //
T02TD1294E:172b-1: 'od zer gyis ni mdun du dgod //
T02TD1294E:172b-2: de la mchod yon mchod par bya //
T02TD1294E:172b-3: cung zad sngags dang bcas par brjod //
T02TD1294E:172b-4: de nas goo r'i la sogs pa //
T02TD1294E:172b-5: dbyer med bstim par bya ba dang //
T02TD1294E:172b-6: mchod cing bstod pa sngar bzhin bya //
T02TD1294E:172b-7: bdud rtsi myang ba 'dir mi dgos //
T02TD1294E:172b-9: de nas bzlas pa bya ba ste /
T02TD1294E:172b-10: dang po lha mo bzhi yi sngags //
T02TD1294E:172b-11: ru ru sphu ru la sogs pas //
T02TD1294E:172b-12: bum nang chu la sogs pa'i rdzas //
T02TD1294E:172b-13: 'byung ba bzhi yis bsdus pa kun //
T02TD1294E:172b-14: lha mo bzhi ru byin gyis brlab //
T02TD1294E:172b-15: de nas lha yis bzlas pa yang //
T02TD1294E:172b-16: brgya'am stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas //
T02TD1294E:172b-17: de tshe bdag gis bsam rgyud ni //
T02TD1294E:172b-18: snying gar gzung ba'i skud pa nas //
T02TD1294E:172b-19: yi ge h'um la lag pa sbyor //
T02TD1294E:172b-21: byang sems gyen du drangs gyur te //
T02TD1294E:172b-22: skud pa'i gzugs kyis rdo rjer thim //
T02TD1294E:172b-23: rdo rje bum nang lha la thim //
T02TD1294E:172b-24: lha kun zhu bas bum pa gang //
T02TD1294E:172b-25: de nas rol mor bcas pa yis //
T02TD1294E:172b-26: ras bzang me tog gcal bkram pa'i //
T02TD1294E:172b-27: steng du byin gyis brlabs la gzhag / de ltar rnam rgyal bum pa bzhin //
T02TD1294E:172b-28: bum pa gzhan la'ang lha rer zhu //
T02TD1294E:172b-29: ci rigs pa yi tshogs mchod bya //
T02TD1294E:172b-30: de nas bla ma slob dpon gyis //
T02TD1294E:172b-31: slob ma lhag par gnas par bya //
T02TD1294E:172b-32: sdom ni mtshan nyid bya ba dang //
T02TD1294E:172b-33: cho ga smin pa rnam bzhi'o //
T02TD1294E:172b-34: de la mtshan nyid ces pa ni //
T02TD1294E:172b-35: nga rgyal med cing dbang dul la //
T02TD1294E:172b-36: rigs bzang dge ba bcu dang ldan //
T02TD1294E:172b-37: rgyal po'am rang gi bu med pa //
T02TD1294E:172b-38: de nas mtshan nyid ldan pa gzhug / bya ba zhes pa ni /
T02TD1294E:172b-39: snga bar khrus dang mandala bya //
T02TD1294E:172b-40: de la sems bskyed sdom pa sbyin //
T02TD1294E:172b-41: de yi nyin par slob ma ni //
T02TD1294E:172b-42: bsam pa bzang po ldan bzhin du //
T02TD1294E:172b-43: rdzas 'di dag ni nyer bsag bya //
T02TD1294E:172b-44: bum pa'i sman la sogs pa dang //
T02TD1294E:172b-45: ku sha srung skud la sogs dang //
T02TD1294E:172b-46: gzhan yang mchod pa'i rdzas rnams dang //
T02TD1294E:172b-47: tshogs kyi longs spyod la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1294E:172b-49: dang por las kyi rdo rje yis //
T02TD1294E:172b-50: tshogs bsags pa dang yan lag drug / bdag nyid ldan pa phun sum tshogs //
T02TD1294E:172b-51: sngar bzhin byas nas bla ma la //
T02TD1294E:172b-52: mos pa'i dbang gis 'pho byas la //
T02TD1294E:172b-53: de nas bla ma mos ldan la //
T02TD1294E:173a-2: byas te gsol ba gdab par bya //
T02TD1294E:173a-3: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas //
T02TD1294E:173a-4: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02TD1294E:173a-5: mgon po chen po tshul bstan pa //
T02TD1294E:173a-6: dam tshig de nyid bdag la gsol //
T02TD1294E:173a-7: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD1294E:173a-8: skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la gsol //
T02TD1294E:173a-9: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02TD1294E:173a-10: mgon po bdag ni 'jug par bgyi //
T02TD1294E:173a-11: bu tshur theg pa chen po yi //
T02TD1294E:173a-12: khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te //
T02TD1294E:173a-14: khyod la yang dag bshad par bya //
T02TD1294E:173a-15: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang //
T02TD1294E:173a-16: de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang //
T02TD1294E:173a-17: da ltar byung ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02TD1294E:173a-18: 'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa rnams //
T02TD1294E:173a-19: de dag rnams kyis gsang sngags kyi //
T02TD1294E:173a-20: cho ga bzang po 'di mkhyen nas //
T02TD1294E:173a-21: dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du //
T02TD1294E:173a-22: thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan ma rnyed //
T02TD1294E:173a-23: gsang sngags spyod pa mnyam med de //
T02TD1294E:173a-24: skyob pa dpal ldan he ru kas //
T02TD1294E:173a-25: bdud sde shin tu mi bzang rnams //
T02TD1294E:173a-26: dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom //
T02TD1294E:173a-27: de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir //
T02TD1294E:173a-28: bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig / sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la //
T02TD1294E:173a-29: rtag tu bdag ni skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1294E:173a-31: 'khor lor bzhugs pa'i bdag nyid can //
T02TD1294E:173a-32: kun la'ang rtag tu skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1294E:173a-33: dpa' bo dpa' mo dbang lha mo //
T02TD1294E:173a-34: byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che //
T02TD1294E:173a-35: khyad par du yang slob dpon la //
T02TD1294E:173a-36: rtag tu bdag ni skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1294E:173a-37: dpal ldan khrag 'thung dpa' bo dang //
T02TD1294E:173a-38: rnal 'byor ma dang rnam snang sogs //
T02TD1294E:173a-39: byang chub sems dpa' dpag med pa //
T02TD1294E:173a-40: thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD1294E:173a-41: che ge dus 'di nas bzung ste //
T02TD1294E:173a-42: ji srid bdag med par gnas pa //
T02TD1294E:173a-43: de yi tshangs spyod gnyis med par //
T02TD1294E:173a-44: bdag nyid sdom pa'i legs par bzung //
T02TD1294E:173a-45: de nas bshags pa la sogs pa //
T02TD1294E:173a-46: gzhan las byung bzhin tshig tu yang //
T02TD1294E:173a-47: slob ma dag ni brjod du gzhug / de nas bdag gis tshig bcad 'di //
T02TD1294E:173a-48: rna ru 'bab pa dbyangs su brjod //
T02TD1294E:173a-49: bdag gis sdig pa bgyis pa dang //
T02TD1294E:173a-50: bgyid du stsal dang yi rang ba //
T02TD1294E:173b-0: sangs rgyas spyan @173b sngar mchis nas su //
T02TD1294E:173b-1: de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi //
T02TD1294E:173b-2: sangs rgyas byang sems dpa' dang //
T02TD1294E:173b-3: rang rgyal dgra bcom 'gro rnams kyi //
T02TD1294E:173b-4: bsgom dang bzlas brjod bsod nams tshogs //
T02TD1294E:173b-5: de la bdag ni yi rang ngo //
T02TD1294E:173b-6: sems bskyed mngon par sangs rgyas dang //
T02TD1294E:173b-7: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang //
T02TD1294E:173b-8: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs mchog la //
T02TD1294E:173b-9: de la bdag ni skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1294E:173b-10: sangs rgyas 'byung ba ji lta bar //
T02TD1294E:173b-11: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis //
T02TD1294E:173b-12: byang chub sems ni bskyed pa ltar //
T02TD1294E:173b-13: 'di nyid du ni sems bskyed do //
T02TD1294E:173b-14: de nas slob mas 'di skad brjod //
T02TD1294E:173b-15: gtso bo bdag la sdom pa gsol //
T02TD1294E:173b-16: thub pa nyi ma ma lus pa'i //
T02TD1294E:173b-17: sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs //
T02TD1294E:173b-18: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni //
T02TD1294E:173b-19: slob dpon dpang du gnas pa la //
T02TD1294E:173b-20: sangs rgyas rol pa las byung ba'i //
T02TD1294E:173b-21: mi ldog pa yi 'khor lor sbyor //
T02TD1294E:173b-22: thar pa'i rang bzhin grong khyer che //
T02TD1294E:173b-23: slob dpon bdag ni 'jug par mdzod //
T02TD1294E:173b-24: de nas bla mas 'di skad brjod //
T02TD1294E:173b-25: rtog pa rnams ni legs par bsdus nas kyang //
T02TD1294E:173b-26: shin tu bsam pa bzang po ldan pas nyon //
T02TD1294E:173b-27: brjed ngas blo la rdo rje sems sogs pa'i //
T02TD1294E:173b-28: bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis byin mi rlob //
T02TD1294E:173b-29: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD1294E:173b-30: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02TD1294E:173b-31: deng nas brtsams te skyabs su song //
T02TD1294E:173b-32: 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i //
T02TD1294E:173b-33: sdom pa dam tshig yin par gsungs //
T02TD1294E:173b-34: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //
T02TD1294E:173b-35: bla chen khyod kyis gzung bar gyis //
T02TD1294E:173b-36: byang chub sems gang rdo rje de //
T02TD1294E:173b-37: shes rab dril bu zhes bshad do //
T02TD1294E:173b-38: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD1294E:173b-39: 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs dag pa'i //
T02TD1294E:173b-40: dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs //
T02TD1294E:173b-41: rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02TD1294E:173b-42: dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la //
T02TD1294E:173b-43: zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams //
T02TD1294E:173b-44: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin //
T02TD1294E:173b-45: padma'i rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD1294E:173b-46: phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum //
T02TD1294E:173b-47: dam chos khyod kyis gzung bar gyis //
T02TD1294E:173b-48: las kyi rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD1294E:173b-49: sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02TD1294E:173b-50: yang dag nyid du gzung bar gyis //
T02TD1294E:173b-51: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus kyis //
T02TD1294E:173b-52: gzhan yang bcu bzhi 'di dag ni //
T02TD1294E:174a-0: @174a * // phas pham par ni rab tu bshad //
T02TD1294E:174a-1: rtsa ba'i ltung ba zhes bshad de //
T02TD1294E:174a-2: kha na ma tho sbom por 'gyur //
T02TD1294E:174a-3: khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya //
T02TD1294E:174a-4: ma byin par yang mi blang ngo //
T02TD1294E:174a-5: 'dod pa log par mi spyod cing //
T02TD1294E:174a-6: brdzun du smra bar mi bya'o //
T02TD1294E:174a-7: phung khrol kun gyi rtsar gyur pa'i //
T02TD1294E:174a-8: chang na rnam par spang bar bya //
T02TD1294E:174a-9: sems can gdul phyir ma gtogs par //
T02TD1294E:174a-10: bya ba ma yin thams cad spang //
T02TD1294E:174a-11: dam pa nye bar bsten bya zhing //
T02TD1294E:174a-12: rnal 'byor pa rnams bkur bar bya //
T02TD1294E:174a-13: lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang //
T02TD1294E:174a-14: ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang //
T02TD1294E:174a-15: yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni //
T02TD1294E:174a-16: ci nus par ni rjes su spongs //
T02TD1294E:174a-17: theg pa dman la 'dod mi bya //
T02TD1294E:174a-18: 'gro ba'i don la rgyab phyogs min //
T02TD1294E:174a-20: rtag tu mya ngan 'das mi chags //
T02TD1294E:174a-21: lha dang lha min gsang ba pa //
T02TD1294E:174a-22: khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya zhing //
T02TD1294E:174a-23: phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang //
T02TD1294E:174a-25: 'di dag dam tshig yin par gsungs //
T02TD1294E:174a-26: khyod kyis kyang ni bsrung bar gyis //
T02TD1294E:174a-27: de nas slob mas 'di skad brjod //
T02TD1294E:174a-28: mgon po bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD1294E:174a-29: ma lus bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02TD1294E:174a-30: dus 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas par //
T02TD1294E:174a-31: bla med bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD1294E:174a-32: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po nas //
T02TD1294E:174a-33: sems can mya ngan las 'das dgod //
T02TD1294E:174a-34: lan gsum du ni brjod par bya //
T02TD1294E:174a-35: de ltar phyi tshul byin brlabs nas //
T02TD1294E:174a-36: man ngag gis ni nang byin brlab //
T02TD1294E:174a-37: de yang slob mas 'di skad brjod //
T02TD1294E:174a-38: bdag ni dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis //
T02TD1294E:174a-39: 'jig rten mi ring sangs rgyas myur bsgrubs nas //
T02TD1294E:174a-40: sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying ba rnams //
T02TD1294E:174a-41: bla med byang chub tu ni bsgral bar bgyi //
T02TD1294E:174a-42: yang na 'di skad brjod du gzhug / de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba //
T02TD1294E:174a-43: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02TD1294E:174a-44: rdo rje sems dpa' kun gyi mchog /'dren pa bdag la byin gyis rlobs //
T02TD1294E:174a-45: mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su brjod //
T02TD1294E:174a-46: mtshan min thams cad dag pa yang //
T02TD1294E:174a-47: kun du bzang po sangs rgyas mchog /'dren pa bdag la byin gyis rlobs //
T02TD1294E:174b-0: @174b yang dag sangs rgyas mchog zhi ba //
T02TD1294E:174b-1: ye shes spyod pa rnam par sbyong //
T02TD1294E:174b-2: kun du rdo rje gsum 'byung ba //
T02TD1294E:174b-3: 'dren pa bdag la byin gyis rlobs //
T02TD1294E:174b-4: sems can kun gyi sems chen po //
T02TD1294E:174b-5: rang bzhin dag pa'i dri ma med //
T02TD1294E:174b-7: 'dren pa bdag la byin gyis rlobs //
T02TD1294E:174b-8: de dag glur bcas sngags 'di brjod //
T02TD1294E:174b-9: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta s'i tam /
T02TD1294E:174b-10: sarba ta th'a ga t'a la yam /
T02TD1294E:174b-11: badzra sa tva sa mudbhya ba ham /
T02TD1294E:174b-12: ma m'a dhi ta shtha na ya kam / sarba ka la kasha sam p'u ra:/
T02TD1294E:174b-13: sarb'a laksha na bi brdzi ta /
T02TD1294E:174b-14: sa manta bha dra buddha ba ham /
T02TD1294E:174b-15: ma m'a dhi ti shth'a na ya kam / sh'anta bha rmotta lodbha ba /
T02TD1294E:174b-16: dzny'a na tsa ra bi shodha kam / badzra ra li sa mudbha tam /
T02TD1294E:174b-17: ma m'a aa dhi ti shth'a na ya kam / sarba satva ma h'a tsi ttam /
T02TD1294E:174b-18: shuddha: pra kri ti ni rma lam /
T02TD1294E:174b-19: ma h'a bee ro tsa na buddham /
T02TD1294E:174b-20: ma ma aa dhi ti shth'a na ya kam / de skad brjod cing smad lnga gtugs //
T02TD1294E:174b-21: brkyang phyag btsal te zhus pa dang //
T02TD1294E:174b-22: bla mas rang snang rig ma dang //
T02TD1294E:174b-24: slob ma'i sgo gsum dag par sbyang //
T02TD1294E:174b-25: slob ma bu ru bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD1294E:174b-26: de nas gsang ba'i gnas su gzhug / ci rigs dbang yang bskur bya ste //
T02TD1294E:174b-27: slar byung lus 'dud spyan sngar ni //
T02TD1294E:174b-28: de la las kyi rdo rje yis //
T02TD1294E:174b-29: dri chab raksha'i sngags kyis bsrung //
T02TD1294E:174b-30: spos su ldan pa'i lag pa yis //
T02TD1294E:174b-31: spyi bor reg nas gnas gsum du //
T02TD1294E:174b-32: de nyid gsum gyi gnas kyis brjod //
T02TD1294E:174b-33: aom bo dhi tsi tta autp'a da y'a mi //
T02TD1294E:174b-34: de ni sngar gyi thun mong la'o //
T02TD1294E:174b-35: aom yo ga tsi tta aup'a da y'a mi su ra stvam /
T02TD1294E:174b-37: slob ma kun la de bzhin bya //
T02TD1294E:174b-38: de ltar sems bskyed dang po dang //
T02TD1294E:174b-39: khyad par rdo rje 'chang ba'i rigs //
T02TD1294E:174b-40: ji ltar bde las gyur pa de //
T02TD1294E:174b-41: sangs rgyas nyid dang sangs rgyas sras //
T02TD1294E:174b-42: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi yab //
T02TD1294E:174b-43: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sras //
T02TD1294E:174b-44: bde gshegs sras kyi thu bo'o //
T02TD1294E:174b-45: bde gshegs bka' bzhin byed la sogs //
T02TD1294E:174b-46: sems bskyed yon tan ldan dag la //
T02TD1294E:174b-47: mgo la me tog sbyin par bya //
T02TD1294E:174b-48: mdun du spos sbyin mar me dang //
T02TD1294E:174b-49: dri yi mchod pa snying gar sbyin //
T02TD1294E:174b-50: de bzhin bshos gtsang la sogs pa //
T02TD1294E:174b-51: ci rigs sngags dang phyag rgyas dbul //
T02TD1294E:174b-52: de nas so shing yid du 'ong //
T02TD1294E:175a-2: bha ba ta sogs shing bzang pos //
T02TD1294E:175a-3: mi yo ma chag 'bus ma zos //
T02TD1294E:175a-4: ma rnyings srog chags spangs pa ni //
T02TD1294E:175a-5: sor ni bcu gnyis tshad du bya //
T02TD1294E:175a-6: rtse mor me tog ldan bcings la //
T02TD1294E:175a-7: lci ba la sogs ba byung lngas //
T02TD1294E:175a-8: sa gzhi byugs pa ba ko tsam //
T02TD1294E:175a-9: mandala de yi drung du ni //
T02TD1294E:175a-10: slob ma langs te 'dug byas nas //
T02TD1294E:175a-11: langs te kha ton dag byas nas //
T02TD1294E:175a-12: ltos pa med par thal sbyar gzung //
T02TD1294E:175a-13: shar bltas mi dma' lus mi yo //
T02TD1294E:175a-14: phan tshun mi dor mdun drang por //
T02TD1294E:175a-15: dor ba de la mtshan ma brtag / de yang bla ma'i gdams ngag gis //
T02TD1294E:175a-16: dngos grub phrin las bar chod gsum //
T02TD1294E:175a-17: dngos grub rab 'bring tha ma gsum //
T02TD1294E:175a-18: dngos grub rab ni shar phyogs dang //
T02TD1294E:175a-19: rang la bltas pa las shes bya //
T02TD1294E:175a-20: 'bring po gzhan dag tha ma yang //
T02TD1294E:175a-21: 'og bltas 'dam la mo tog zug / de bzhin gnyis po bla ma yi //
T02TD1294E:175a-22: zhal gyi gdams ngag las shes bya'o //

T02TD1294E:178a-22: sta gon zla ba kha sbyar te //
T02TD1294E:178a-23: dbyangs yig rgya bkrol nam mkha' nas //
T02TD1294E:178a-24: sngags ni so so'i sngags brjod cing //
T02TD1294E:178a-25: de la dbus kyi gdan steng du //
T02TD1294E:178a-26: skyes pa'i thod pa'i rgya gram bri //
T02TD1294E:178a-28: gri gug cang te'u rus sbal sbrul //
T02TD1294E:178a-29: sdo dang dmar ser ljang go rims //
T02TD1294E:178a-31: seng ge dge slong 'khor lo rdo rje ni //
T02TD1294E:178a-32: sngo dkar ljang khra rim bzhin dgod //
T02TD1294E:178a-33: de tshe kun la sngags brjod cing //
T02TD1294E:178a-35: de nas bla re rgyal mtshan gdugs //
T02TD1294E:178a-36: ba dan rgyan sogs 'phen rnams bri //
T02TD1294E:178a-37: phyi ril mtshams dang rol mo brdung //
T02TD1294E:178a-38: spos dang bcas pas bum pa rnams //
T02TD1294E:178a-39: sta gon gnas nas spyan drangs te //
T02TD1294E:178a-40: chu dang rin chen sman la sogs //
T02TD1294E:178a-41: bsam pa gzhug cing ting 'dzin bskyed //
T02TD1294E:178a-42: rol mor bcas pas dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD1294E:178a-43: lag tu thogs te lan gsum bskor //
T02TD1294E:178a-44: rnam rgyal bum pa gtso bo'i mdun //
T02TD1294E:178a-45: shar sgo'i g-yas su las thams cad //
T02TD1294E:178a-46: gzhan dag sgo dang mtshams bzhir dgod //
T02TD1294E:178a-47: de nas bskor ba lan gsum rjes //
T02TD1294E:178a-48: me tog phreng ba lha la dbul //
T02TD1294E:178a-49: nang par lhas sbyin me tog phreng //
T02TD1294E:178a-50: de nyid dkar bcas mgo la bcings //
T02TD1294E:178a-51: las kyi byed pa'am khang skyong gis //
T02TD1294E:178a-52: dkyil 'khor nye ba'i sa phyogs su //
T02TD1294E:178b-0: chag chag @178b me tog sil ma dkram [*mad kram?] //
T02TD1294E:178b-1: spos sogs mchod yon thams cad dgod //
T02TD1294E:178b-2: rtag tu bla ma la sogs gdab //
T02TD1294E:178b-3: de nas bla mas nye reg dang //
T02TD1294E:178b-4: bdud rtsi ri lu kha ru gzhug / stan der 'dug nas dkyil 'khor bsgrub //
T02TD1294E:178b-5: rig dang bcas pas yan lag drug / bsam rgyud ting 'dzin gsal ba dang //
T02TD1294E:178b-6: las kyi rdo rjes sngar bzhin du //
T02TD1294E:178b-7: rakshas bsrung ba nas bzung nas //
T02TD1294E:178b-8: mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang ba'i bar //
T02TD1294E:178b-9: bdag nyid ldan pa phun sum tshogs //
T02TD1294E:178b-10: bla mas kyang ni sngar bzhin du //
T02TD1294E:178b-12: gzugs brnyan la brten sa bon nam //
T02TD1294E:178b-13: phyag mtshan tsam gyis lha rnams bskyed //
T02TD1294E:178b-14: de ltar dkyil 'khor sum bsres la //
T02TD1294E:178b-15: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las //
T02TD1294E:178b-16: 'od zer phyung ste lha rnams bsdu //
T02TD1294E:178b-17: de la mchod dgug gzhug la sogs //
T02TD1294E:178b-18: sngar bzhin thim pas ye shes 'bar //
T02TD1294E:178b-20: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' ni //
T02TD1294E:178b-21: bsgrubs te gzhan du yang ma yin //
T02TD1294E:178b-22: de ltar dkyil 'khor bzhi bsres la //
T02TD1294E:178b-23: bla mas mchod dang bstod pa dang //
T02TD1294E:178b-24: bdud rtsi myang dang bzlas brjod bya //
T02TD1294E:178b-25: de tshe bla mas bzlas dang bsgom //
T02TD1294E:178b-26: rnal 'byor ldan la slob ma yis //
T02TD1294E:178b-28: de yi ngor byas bla ma nyid //
T02TD1294E:178b-29: ji ltar slob mas 'jug pa bzhin //
T02TD1294E:178b-30: rim gyis byas te dbang yang yin //
T02TD1294E:178b-31: chu dang dbu rgyan la sogs pa //
T02TD1294E:178b-32: rjes gnang mthar thug rim bzhin no //
T02TD1294E:178b-33: lha yis rjes gnang byin pa yang //
T02TD1294E:178b-34: khyod kyis sems can bsdu ba dang //
T02TD1294E:178b-36: dbang bskur dam tshig ldan par gyis //
T02TD1294E:178b-37: zhi sogs las kyis rjes gzung dang //
T02TD1294E:178b-38: tshar gcod pa yi sems can kun //
T02TD1294E:178b-39: don rnams ma lus kun gyis shig / dman dang mchog gi dngos grub la //
T02TD1294E:178b-40: skal ba bzhin du rim par sbyor //
T02TD1294E:178b-41: de nas sngon du brtags pa yi //
T02TD1294E:178b-42: slob ma mtshan nyid ldan pa yis //
T02TD1294E:178b-43: 'jug dang dbang thob bya phyir brjod //
T02TD1294E:178b-44: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa pos //
T02TD1294E:178b-45: zhes sogs sngar bzhin brjod pa dang //
T02TD1294E:178b-46: bla mas brtse dang ldan pa khyod //
T02TD1294E:178b-47: su yin ci 'dod gang la dga' //
T02TD1294E:179a-2: skal ldan bdag lags rnam grol 'tshal //
T02TD1294E:179a-3: bde ba che la bdag dga'o //
T02TD1294E:179a-4: zhes brjod yang ni 'di skad brjod //
T02TD1294E:179a-5: sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku //
T02TD1294E:179a-6: slob dpon la ni skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1294E:179a-7: gtso bo lha mor bcas pa yi //
T02TD1294E:179a-8: lha rnams la yang phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1294E:179a-9: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02TD1294E:179a-10: mgon po bdag ni 'jug par gsol //
T02TD1294E:179a-11: zhes pas slob dpon la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1294E:179a-12: de nas slob dpon gyis 'di skad brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1294E:179a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02TD1294E:179a-14: he ru ka dpal grong khyer mchog / snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni //
T02TD1294E:179a-15: bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bgyi //
T02TD1294E:179a-16: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha la lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo nas phyag bya ste /
T02TD1294E:179a-19: aom na mo na ma h'um /
T02TD1294E:179a-21: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya w'a ka tsi tta pra na me na badzra bandha nam ka ro mi /
T02TD1294E:179a-23: sgo gsum gus pas phyag byas la //
T02TD1294E:179a-24: de nas sngar bzhin slob ma yis //
T02TD1294E:179a-25: gtso bo bdag la sdom pa gsol //
T02TD1294E:179a-26: thub pa nyi ma la sogs brjod //
T02TD1294E:179a-27: de bzhin sdom pa dam tshig ni //
T02TD1294E:179a-28: sta gon gnas pa sngar bzhin bya //
T02TD1294E:179a-29: de nas bla mas 'di skad brjod //
T02TD1294E:179a-30: deng khyod dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi nang du zhugs kyi /
T02TD1294E:179a-31: ngas khyod la dpal he ru ka'i ye shes bskyed par bya ste /
T02TD1294E:179a-32: khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD1294E:179a-34: rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur na /
T02TD1294E:179a-35: dngos grub gzhan smos kyang ci dgos /
T02TD1294E:179a-36: de lta bu'i ye shes bskyed par bya yi /
T02TD1294E:179a-37: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba'i mdun du smra bar mi bya ste /
T02TD1294E:179a-38: dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re /
T02TD1294E:179a-39: he ru ka dpal deng khyod kyi //
T02TD1294E:179a-40: snying la yang dag gzhug pa ni //
T02TD1294E:179a-41: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02TD1294E:179a-42: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02TD1294E:179a-43: de nas ka p'a la'i nang du bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa'i dam tshig gi chu blud pa ni kye'i rdo rje gzi mdangs dang ldan pas 'di skad brjod do //
T02TD1294E:179a-44: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02TD1294E:179a-45: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni //
T02TD1294E:179a-46: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis grub //
T02TD1294E:179a-47: aom sarba badzra panytsa aa mri ta au da ka h'um /
T02TD1294E:179b-0: deng @179b nas brtsams nas khyod kyi dpal he ru ka nga yin gyi gang ngas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba de khyod kyis bya dgos te /
T02TD1294E:179b-1: da khyod ngal brnyas pa'i las ma byed cig / byas na khyod kyi mi bde ba ma spangs par /
T02TD1294E:179b-2: tshe'i dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re /
T02TD1294E:179b-4: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyang 'grub par dka' ba ma lags na /
T02TD1294E:179b-5: dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes pas yol ba'i nang du drangs te /
T02TD1294E:179b-6: ye shes dbab pa bla ma'i man ngag bzhin bya'o /
T02TD1294E:179b-7: de nas mthong ba dri ba dang me tog gi phreng ba thogs te /
T02TD1294E:179b-9: zhes brjod cing phreng ba dor ba dang /
T02TD1294E:179b-11: aom rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
T02TD1294E:179b-12: mig 'byed pa ni brtson pa ste //
T02TD1294E:179b-13: mig ni thams cad 'byed mdzad pas //
T02TD1294E:179b-14: rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med //
T02TD1294E:179b-16: de nyid sngags su brjod pa ni //
T02TD1294E:179b-17: aom badzra stva sva yam dya ya /
T02TD1294E:179b-18: tsaksh'a dgha tta ya ta tpa ra /
T02TD1294E:179b-19: audgha ta la ti sarb'a ksho /
T02TD1294E:179b-20: badzra tsa kshu r'a nutta ra /
T02TD1294E:179b-21: he badzra pre be sha / de nas gdong g-yogs phud cing 'di skad brjod do //
T02TD1294E:179b-22: da ni dad pa rab tu bskyed //
T02TD1294E:179b-24: khyod ni rnal 'byor ma rig skyes //
T02TD1294E:179b-25: sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD1294E:179b-26: 'gro ba'i phun sum tshogs kun dang //
T02TD1294E:179b-27: dngos grub thams cad mngon du gyur //
T02TD1294E:179b-28: dam tshig thams cad bskyad pa dang //
T02TD1294E:179b-29: gsang sngags la yang brtson par gyis //
T02TD1294E:179b-31: me tog gang la ltung ba'i lha ngo bstan cing lhag par dbog / sngags bslab cing de kho na nyid bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1294E:179b-32: de la gzhal yas khang gru bzhir byung ba ni tshad med pa'i rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD1294E:179b-33: sgo bzhi ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1294E:179b-34: rta babs bzhi ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1294E:179b-35: dra ba ni nyon mongs pa chen po rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD1294E:179b-36: dra ba phyed pa ni nyon mongs pa chung du rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD1294E:179b-38: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD1294E:179b-39: dar gyi pa ti la sogs pa'i rgyan rnams ni tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1294E:180a-0: @180a * // 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams ni gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD1294E:180a-1: rdo rjer ba ni zab mo'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rtags so //
T02TD1294E:180a-2: me 'od ni phyi rol gyi bgegs la sogs pas mi tshugs pa'i rtags so //
T02TD1294E:180a-3: bum pa brgyad ni che ba'i yon tan gyis rgyas shing thugs rje chen po'i ngos yongs su gang ba'i rtags so //
T02TD1294E:180a-4: de nas lha'i de kho na nyid bstan te /
T02TD1294E:180a-5: de la bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa'i rdo rje ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po dang zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1294E:180a-6: goo r'i ni zhe sdang dang gzugs rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1294E:180a-7: chom rkun ma ni gti mug dang sgra rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1294E:180a-8: ro langs ma ni nga rgyal dang dri rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1294E:180a-9: ghasma r'i ni 'dod chags dang ro rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1294E:180a-10: pukka s'i ni zhe sdang dang sa rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1294E:180a-11: ri khrod ma ni gti mug dang chu rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1294E:180a-12: gtum mo ni nga rgyal dang me rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1294E:180a-13: g-yung mo ni 'dod chags dang rlung rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1294E:180a-14: bdag med rnal 'byor ma ni yab dang mthun no //
T02TD1294E:180a-15: de ltar de kho na nyid dang bshad nas slob mas mandala sngon du 'gro bas bla ma'i zhabs la gtugs shing yon gyi mchog phul nas dbang skur ba'i don du gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1294E:180a-16: de yang thun mong gi dbang nod pa yin na /
T02TD1294E:180a-18: byang chub rdo rje sangs gyas la //
T02TD1294E:180a-19: mchod chen ji ltar mdzad pa bzhin //
T02TD1294E:180a-20: bdag kyang rab tu bsgral slad du //
T02TD1294E:180a-21: nam mkha'i rdo rje bdag la gsol //
T02TD1294E:180a-23: bying ba skyabs med bdag la skyobs //
T02TD1294E:180a-24: mgon po khyod kyi bka' drin gyis //
T02TD1294E:180a-25: rig pa'i dbang bskur bdag la gsol //
T02TD1294E:180a-27: khyad par slob dpon gyi dbang yin na 'di skad brjod par bya ste /
T02TD1294E:180a-28: he ru ka dpal dbang bskur ba //
T02TD1294E:180a-29: 'gro ba bskyab phyir gzi brjid can //
T02TD1294E:180a-30: ci ltar yon tan 'byung gnas so //
T02TD1294E:180a-31: de bzhin bdag la de gsol cig / dpa' bo chen po mi ldog pa'i //
T02TD1294E:180a-32: dbang bskur ba ni bdag la gsol //
T02TD1294E:180a-33: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD1294E:180b-0: bdag ni rtag tu @180b slob dpon bgyis //
T02TD1294E:180b-2: de nas thun mong dang khyad par gyi slob ma rnams tha mal gyi stan dang /
T02TD1294E:180b-3: khyad par gyi gdan seng ge'i khri'am /
T02TD1294E:180b-4: padmas mtshan pa gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1294E:180b-5: gdugs dkar po gser gyi yu ba can phub nas /
T02TD1294E:180b-6: slob dpon gyis kyang lha rnams ci rigs par mchod nas /
T02TD1294E:180b-7: bdud rtsi dang dri'i chu dang nyungs kar lag tu thogs nas bdag nyid nga rgyal dang bcas pas 'di skad brjod //
T02TD1294E:180b-8: nyon cig bar chad bgegs kyi tshogs //
T02TD1294E:180b-9: da ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
T02TD1294E:180b-10: mtshon cha sna tshogs 'bar ba'i bdag / gdug pa ma lus 'joms par byed //
T02TD1294E:180b-11: dengs shig par chad bgegs kyi tshogs //
T02TD1294E:180b-12: nga yi bka' las 'da' ma byed //
T02TD1294E:180b-13: ci ste bka' las 'das gyur na //
T02TD1294E:180b-14: rdul phran bzhin du rlag par byed //
T02TD1294E:180b-16: bdag nyid bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags dang ting nge 'dzin du gnas pas bskrad pa'am //
T02TD1294E:180b-17: raksha la sogs pa'i sngags brjod cing ra ba dang gur la sogs pas bsrung ba'o //
T02TD1294E:180b-18: de nas slob mas khrus byas shing /
T02TD1294E:180b-19: stod g-yogs la sogs gos bzangs ldan //
T02TD1294E:180b-20: drug pa rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi dbang //
T02TD1294E:180b-21: nod phyi snyim pa me tog gis //
T02TD1294E:180b-23: aom pra t'i tstsha badzra ho //
T02TD1294E:180b-24: zhes pa'i sngags brjod pas so //
T02TD1294E:180b-25: de rjes bla mas me tog blangs //
T02TD1294E:180b-26: slob ma'i mgo la bcings byas la //
T02TD1294E:180b-27: aom dharm'a: kunda aa bhi shinytsa zhes brjod par ni //
T02TD1294E:180b-28: chos kun bsdus shing 'khyil bas ni //
T02TD1294E:180b-29: lhag pa'i lha yin de skad du //
T02TD1294E:180b-30: phreng ba yi dam rgyal ba'i dbang //
T02TD1294E:180b-31: sgom phyir dbang bskur dam tshig ldan //
T02TD1294E:180b-32: de rjes las kyi rdo rje yis //
T02TD1294E:180b-33: bum pa'i chu rnams bsdus nas ni //
T02TD1294E:180b-34: bzang po rnam rgyal bum par bsdus //
T02TD1294E:180b-35: de rjes dung chos nyid du'o //
T02TD1294E:180b-36: de nas rnam rgyal chu rgyun gyis //
T02TD1294E:180b-37: dril bu'i sgra dang dbyangs bcas pas //
T02TD1294E:180b-38: dbang skur ba ni 'di skad brjod //
T02TD1294E:180b-39: gsang gsum gnas las byung ba yi //
T02TD1294E:180b-40: khams gsum pa yis dbang bskur //
T02TD1294E:180b-41: sangs rgyas kun gyi chu yi dbang //
T02TD1294E:180b-42: deng 'dir khyod la sbyin par bya //
T02TD1294E:180b-43: sangs rgyas kun ni rab bsgrub phyir //
T02TD1294E:180b-44: chu dbang dam pa khyed kyis long //
T02TD1294E:181a-0: aom sarba ta th'a ga ra au da ka aa bhi shinyts'a mi badzra sva bh'a ba @181a * //
T02TD1294E:181a-2: des ni rnam par rtog pa dang //
T02TD1294E:181a-3: nyon mongs pa'i dri ma 'khru bar byed do //
T02TD1294E:181a-4: de nas gser la sogs pa'i rin po che dang shing dang ba so la sogs pa'i 'bur mar brkos pa'am //
T02TD1294E:181a-5: thang ka'i ri mo'am dbu rgyan du byas te /
T02TD1294E:181a-6: tr'am las rin chen 'byung ldan du bsam zhing dgug pa dang gzhug pa la sogs pas ye shes sems dpa' bstims la /
T02TD1294E:181a-7: mchod pa dang bstod pa dang sngags bzlas pa byas la 'di skad brjod do //
T02TD1294E:181a-8: gsang gsum gnas las byung ba yi //
T02TD1294E:181a-9: khams gsum pa yis dbang bskur ba //
T02TD1294E:181a-10: sangs rgyas kun gyi dbu rgyan dbang //
T02TD1294E:181a-11: thor tshugs cod pan gyis brgyan pa'i //
T02TD1294E:181a-12: sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa yi //
T02TD1294E:181a-13: rin chen dag gi dbu rgyan dang //
T02TD1294E:181a-14: dar dbyangs dbang bskur sbyin par bya //
T02TD1294E:181a-15: aom badzra pa r'a ha ka badzra aa ral+li ho: //
T02TD1294E:181a-16: de nas yang rdo rje a'a: las snang ba mtha' yas su bskyed la 'di skad brjod do //
T02TD1294E:181a-17: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1294E:181a-18: he ru ka dpal rgyal po dang //
T02TD1294E:181a-19: mkha' 'gro rnams kyi dbang mchog ni //
T02TD1294E:181a-20: de ring khyod la dbang skur ro //
T02TD1294E:181a-21: aom shr'i he ru ka aa dhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shinytsa tishatha ba'i ra sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD1294E:181a-22: de nas de nyid brjod pa ni //
T02TD1294E:181a-23: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02TD1294E:181a-24: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02TD1294E:181a-25: kun du bzang po kun gyi bdag / rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag ces pa ste //
T02TD1294E:181a-26: rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba lag pa g-yas par sbyin no //
T02TD1294E:181a-27: de nas dril bu kham las don yod grub par bskyed la 'di skad brjod do //
T02TD1294E:181a-29: shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad //
T02TD1294E:181a-30: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung //
T02TD1294E:181a-31: byang chub mchog tu rgyal bas bzhed //
T02TD1294E:181a-32: de yi de nyid bshad pa ni //
T02TD1294E:181a-33: sring pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag / ngo bo nyid kyis dngos med byas //
T02TD1294E:181a-34: de bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02TD1294E:181a-35: srid pa'i dam pa byed par 'gyur //
T02TD1294E:181a-36: badzra sa tva stvam aa bhi shinyatha mi /
T02TD1294E:181a-37: zhes pas lag pa g-yon par dung byin la /
T02TD1294E:181a-38: de nas ming gi dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02TD1294E:181a-39: bhr'um las rnam par snang mdzad du bsam /
T02TD1294E:181a-40: sangs rgyas kun gyi ming gi dbang //
T02TD1294E:181a-41: zhes pa la sogs pa brjod la /
T02TD1294E:181a-42: aom badzra shr'i he ru ka aa dhi ba ti stvam aa bhi shinytsa mi //
T02TD1294E:181a-43: shr'i he ru ka n'a ma aa bhi she ka ta /
T02TD1294E:181a-44: zhes brjod cing rdo rje dril bu mgo'i thad kar sbyin no //
T02TD1294E:181b-0: de nas brtul zhugs kyis brtan @181b par bya'o //
T02TD1294E:181b-1: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid //
T02TD1294E:181b-2: he ru ka dpal phyag na bsnams //
T02TD1294E:181b-3: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02TD1294E:181b-4: he ru ka dpal brtul zhugs brtan //
T02TD1294E:181b-5: rdo rje'i rtse mo nas slob ma 'dzin du bcug la sngags 'di brjod do //
T02TD1294E:181b-6: aom sarba ta th'a ta siddha badzra sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD1294E:181b-7: ae sha stvam dha ra y'a mi h'um sv'a h'a ha ha hi hi zhes brjod la lag par rdo rje rgya gram sbyin no //
T02TD1294E:181b-8: de nas he ru ka dpal gzugs //
T02TD1294E:181b-9: rang gi dkyil 'khor cho gas sbyin //
T02TD1294E:181b-10: rdo rje slob dpon go 'phang thob //
T02TD1294E:181b-11: he ru ka dpal kha tv'am ga / rnal 'byor ma ni da ma ru //
T02TD1294E:181b-12: rdo rje kha tv'am rdo rjer bcas //
T02TD1294E:181b-13: dril bu sil sil sgra sgrogs shing //
T02TD1294E:181b-14: tshangs pa'i skud thogs rnal 'byor bdag / gri gug dang ni ka p'a la //
T02TD1294E:181b-15: dpa' bo chen pos blang bar gyis //
T02TD1294E:181b-17: slob ma de g-yas brkyang g-yon bskum pas gnas la /
T02TD1294E:181b-18: rdo rje gri gug g-yas su sbyin zhing /
T02TD1294E:181b-19: dril bu dang da ma ru dang ka p'a la g-yon du sbyin zhing /
T02TD1294E:181b-20: kha tr'am ga g-yas phyogs su brten pa sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD1294E:181b-21: de lta bu'i che ba'i bdag nyid dag dang ldan par brjod do //
T02TD1294E:181b-22: 'dis ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang rjes su gnang ba dang /
T02TD1294E:181b-24: dbugs dbyung ba dang ldan zhing phrin las kyang rdzogs par 'gyur te /
T02TD1294E:181b-32: gsad pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1294E:181b-33: de rnams la thogs pa med par 'grub par bslab par byos shig / dngos grub 'di dag rdzogs par 'gyur te /
T02TD1294E:181b-36: nyi zla gzung ba la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub dang /
T02TD1294E:181b-37: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'grub par byos shig ces rjes gnang sbyin no //
T02TD1294E:181b-38: de dag ni bum pa'i dbang ngam /
T02TD1294E:181b-39: rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang rdzogs pa ste /
T02TD1294E:181b-40: lus kyi dri ma dag par byed cing byang chub sems dpa' tshogs kyi lam mthar phyin pa dang skal ba mnyam par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1294E:181b-41: de nas dbang bskur ba gnyis pas ni ngag dri ma dag par byed pa dang /
T02TD1294E:181b-42: sbyor ba'i lam gyi nus pa 'jog / dbang bskur gsum pas sems kyi dri ma dag cing mthong lam gyi nus pa 'jog / dbang bskur ba bzhi pas ni nyon mongs pa dang /
T02TD1294E:182a-0: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dag bsgom pa'i lam dang khyad par gyi lam la gnas pa'i nus pa @182a * //
T02TD1294E:182a-1: 'jog / dbang bskur ba de dag gis dbang bskur ba'i rim pa ni bla ma'i zhal la ltos par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas kyang dgongs pa spas pa yin la /
T02TD1294E:182a-2: de bas ni dgongs don nyams pa spang ba'i phyir /
T02TD1294E:182a-3: bdag gis kyang 'dir yi ger bkod pa ma yin snyam du dgongs so //
T02TD1294E:182a-4: de dag gis dbang bstan nas /
T02TD1294E:182a-5: gang gi tshe rab tu gnas par byed par 'dod na /
T02TD1294E:182a-8: shes par bya dang nyams su blang //
T02TD1294E:182a-9: 'bras bu dang ni rnam pa gsum //
T02TD1294E:182a-10: de la shes par bya ba ni 'di yin te /
T02TD1294E:182a-11: rab tu gnas pa thun mong dang khyad par du shes par bya'o //
T02TD1294E:182a-12: mnga' dbul lha ltar mchod pa dang //
T02TD1294E:182a-13: slob ma lta bur dbang bskur ba //
T02TD1294E:182a-14: spyan dbye thun mong gser thur gyis //
T02TD1294E:182a-15: tshigs bcad sngags dang bcas par brjod //
T02TD1294E:182a-16: khyad par spyan ni dbye ba'o //
T02TD1294E:182a-17: zhal bsro ba ni sbyin sreg gis //
T02TD1294E:182a-18: slob ma shis par bya phyir dang //
T02TD1294E:182a-19: lha rnams tshim pa'i don du'o //
T02TD1294E:182a-20: de'i rjes la nyams su blang ba ni 'di yin te /
T02TD1294E:182a-21: sngar bzhin bla mar 'os pa la /
T02TD1294E:182a-22: slob dpon mtshan nyid dang ldan pas gsol ba gdab pa dang /
T02TD1294E:182a-24: sa chog sngar bzhin byas la /
T02TD1294E:182a-25: dkyil 'khor me long gi ngos ltar mnyam pa'i steng du'am /
T02TD1294E:182a-26: stegs bu gru bzhi'i steng du'o //
T02TD1294E:182a-27: lta gon yo byad thams cad nye bar bsags la /
T02TD1294E:182a-28: de la slob dpon du 'os pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD1294E:182a-29: brtan zhing dul ba blo gros ldan //
T02TD1294E:182a-30: bzod ldan drang la g-yo sgyu med //
T02TD1294E:182a-31: sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes //
T02TD1294E:182a-32: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las la mkhas //
T02TD1294E:182a-33: de nyid bcu ni legs par shes //
T02TD1294E:182a-34: 'di ni slob dpon yin zhes bya //
T02TD1294E:182a-35: de yis bstan pa'i gsang sngags rnams //
T02TD1294E:182a-38: des kyang cho ga chad pa med par phun sum tshogs par bya ste /
T02TD1294E:182a-40: cho ga nyams par mi bya ste //
T02TD1294E:182a-41: rab gnas rtag tu smad pa dang //
T02TD1294E:182a-42: tshe 'di'i sdug bsngal chen po dang //
T02TD1294E:182a-44: de bas dngos grub 'dod pa yis //
T02TD1294E:182a-45: bdag nyid kyis ni ci nus las //
T02TD1294E:182a-46: de bzhin cho gar gsungs tshul du //
T02TD1294E:182a-47: kun nas rab tu 'bad de bya //
T02TD1294E:182a-49: de nas dang po slob ma'am /
T02TD1294E:182b-0: sgrub pa'i grogs po rang nyid rgyan dang byug pa @182b la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1294E:182b-1: mchod yon byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02TD1294E:182b-2: yan lag drug gi rnal 'byor bdud rtsi myang ba'i bar du bdag nyid la ldan pa phun sum tshogs pa byas la /
T02TD1294E:182b-3: de nas bla mas kyang phun sum tshogs mos pa 'pho ba dang ldan pas rnal 'byor sgrub pa'i grogs mchog bzhin du ting nge 'dzin bskyed pa dang /
T02TD1294E:182b-4: rang bzhin spyan drangs pa gnyis bsres sam gsum bsres byas la /
T02TD1294E:182b-5: mchod pa dang bstod pa dang bdud rtsi myang ba'i bar du sngar bzhin byas nas sku gzugs la sogs pa dag kyang byi dor byas la sdar gyi gnas su gzhag go //
T02TD1294E:182b-6: de nas me dang chu nang du yungs kar blugs shing sngags 'di bzlas /
T02TD1294E:182b-7: lan gsum bskor zhing gtor bar bya //
T02TD1294E:182b-8: sbyang zhing bsrung ba dag tu bya //
T02TD1294E:182b-9: aom he badzra aa dhi tishtha na barba p'a pam da ha na he badzr'a ya h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1294E:182b-10: de nas 'bru mar la d'ur ba'i pir gyis byug cing /
T02TD1294E:182b-11: aom sarba ta tha'a ga ta k'a ya bi sho dha ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD1294E:182b-12: raksha raksha h'um h'um phat sb'a h'a /
T02TD1294E:182b-13: de nas shun lbags ldas dril phyis dang /
T02TD1294E:182b-14: khrus la sogs pa byas kyang rung /
T02TD1294E:182b-15: ma byas kyang rung sngar gyi de dag gis rten byad pa'o //
T02TD1294E:182b-16: bdug spos thogs shing rol mo dbyangs dang bcas pas sangs rgyas thams cad mdun gyi nam mkha' la dkyil 'khor lha'i rnam par bsdus la 'di skad brjod do //
T02TD1294E:182b-17: dgyes mdzad rdo rje bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD1294E:182b-18: rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1294E:182b-19: slob ma la yang brtse ba dang //
T02TD1294E:182b-20: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
T02TD1294E:182b-21: thugs rje'i bdag nyid can rab gnas //
T02TD1294E:182b-22: mgon po bdag ni bgyid par 'tshal //
T02TD1294E:182b-23: bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la //
T02TD1294E:182b-24: de bas gnang ba mdzad par rigs //
T02TD1294E:182b-25: bdag gi ming brjod 'di zhes pas //
T02TD1294E:182b-26: rig pa'i rgyal po 'di zhes bya //
T02TD1294E:182b-27: yo byad ci 'byor pa yis ni //
T02TD1294E:182b-28: nang par rab gnas bgyid par 'tshal //
T02TD1294E:182b-29: bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la //
T02TD1294E:182b-30: thugs brtse bar ni nyer dgongs nas //
T02TD1294E:182b-31: tshogs pa thams cad rab gnas la //
T02TD1294E:182b-32: byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1294E:182b-35: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang //
T02TD1294E:182b-36: sras bcas 'jig rten rnam grangs dang //
T02TD1294E:182b-37: zhes pa la sogs pas gsol ba gdab cing snyim pa'i me tog gtor zhing 'di skad do //
T02TD1294E:183a-2: me tog bzang po rin chen char //
T02TD1294E:183a-4: kye kye so sor bzhes su gsol /
T02TD1294E:183a-5: aom pa ra ma su kh'a sha ya su la li ti bi l'a sa mi te /
T02TD1294E:183a-6: na m'a mi bha ga w'an dza: h'um bam ho: hi hi hi hi /
T02TD1294E:183a-7: pra t'i dzatsha badzra ku su m'a nydza li n'a tha ho //
T02TD1294E:183a-8: ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad ni //
T02TD1294E:183a-9: dga' ldan na ni bzhugs pa las //
T02TD1294E:183a-10: lha mo sgyu 'phrul lhums zhugs ltar //
T02TD1294E:183a-11: de bzhin gzugs 'dir khyod bzhugs mdzod //
T02TD1294E:183a-12: 'dir bzhugs rtag tu mgon po ni //
T02TD1294E:183a-13: gyur nas me tog la sogs 'di //
T02TD1294E:183a-14: byang chub sems ni 'phel ba'i phyir //
T02TD1294E:183a-15: bdag cag don du bzhes su gsol //
T02TD1294E:183a-17: de yang dkyil 'khor du 'jug cing dbang nod pa yin na /
T02TD1294E:183a-18: sngar bzhin du lha sta gon du gnas pa nyid byas pa ma yin na /
T02TD1294E:183a-19: dgon po bsdu ba dag tsam gyis bya'o //
T02TD1294E:183a-20: de bzhin du dbang yin na slob ma lhag gnas la sdar bzhin du bya ba yin la /
T02TD1294E:183a-21: ma yin na 'di tsam gyis slob ma lhag par gnas par bya ste /
T02TD1294E:183a-22: deng dus bdag tshe 'bras bu yod //
T02TD1294E:183a-23: bdag gi gson pa'ang 'bras bur bcas //
T02TD1294E:183a-24: lha dang dam tshig mnyam pa ru //
T02TD1294E:183a-25: 'byung bar bdag nyid the tshom med //
T02TD1294E:183a-26: byang chub sems dang sems gcig las //
T02TD1294E:183a-27: mi ldog par ni bdag gyur te //
T02TD1294E:183a-28: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su ni //
T02TD1294E:183a-29: deng bdag skye bar the tshom med //
T02TD1294E:183a-30: deng bdag nyid ma dam pa ste //
T02TD1294E:183a-31: bdag gis mchod sbyin bla ma med //
T02TD1294E:183a-32: sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas //
T02TD1294E:183a-33: deng bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no //
T02TD1294E:183a-35: de nas gal te rdul tshon ma bris pa'i lhag gnas yin na shin tu snga bar thig dang tshon la sogs pa sdar bzhin du byas la /
T02TD1294E:183a-36: nyi ma bzang po la rab gnas 'di ltar bya ste /
T02TD1294E:183a-37: yang slob dpon grogs dang bcas pas cho ga nyams par mi bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pas yo byad thams cad bsog cing bstar ba dang /
T02TD1294E:183a-38: rgyan thams cad bri ba dang /
T02TD1294E:183a-39: yang rang nyid grogs dang bcas pas khrus dang byug pa nas gzung ste /
T02TD1294E:183a-40: bdud rtsi myang ba'i bar du bdag nyid la ldan pa phun sum tshogs pa sdar bzhin du bya zhing /
T02TD1294E:183a-41: sku gzugs la sogs byi dor bya ba nas /
T02TD1294E:183b-0: @183b pi tsu pu ri las byung ba'i dril phyis bya ba dang /
T02TD1294E:183b-1: de bzhin du sdar gyi tshigs su bcad pa dang /
T02TD1294E:183b-2: di ring rab gnas bgyid par 'tshal //
T02TD1294E:183b-4: deng bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no //
T02TD1294E:183b-7: de nas ba byung rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i bum pa'i chu la /
T02TD1294E:183b-8: aom bi shu ddhe badzra gro dha h'um a'am bhr'um dzr'im kham h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1294E:183b-9: zhes pas mngon par bzlas pa'i chus khrus bya zhing /
T02TD1294E:183b-10: rol mo dbyangs dang bcas pas 'di skad brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1294E:183b-11: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni //
T02TD1294E:183b-12: lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol ba //
T02TD1294E:183b-13: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
T02TD1294E:183b-14: de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsol lo //
T02TD1294E:183b-15: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka ta sa ma ya shri ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD1294E:183b-16: gzhan yang spyan la sogs pa'i sngags /
T02TD1294E:183b-17: aom ru ru sphu ru la sogs pa yang brjod cing /
T02TD1294E:183b-18: bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa gang yang rung ba cig gis dbyangs su brjod do //
T02TD1294E:183b-19: de nas ras kyis sku phyi bar bya ste /
T02TD1294E:183b-20: bde gshegs sku gzugs dpe dang bral gyis kyang //
T02TD1294E:183b-21: 'gro ba'i don du sku gzugs cir yang gda' //
T02TD1294E:183b-22: rin chen dbyig ltar nyes pa'i skyon bral zhing //
T02TD1294E:183b-23: 'jig rten bsnyen bkur ri mo'i tshul gyis ni //
T02TD1294E:183b-24: dri med rgyal ba rnams kyis rab bsngags pa'i //
T02TD1294E:183b-25: ras mchog 'di yis rgyal ba'i sku phyi bas //
T02TD1294E:183b-26: nyon mongs sgrib pa ma lus kun byang nas //
T02TD1294E:183b-27: sku gsum dang du bdag cag grub par shog / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra wa stra ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD1294E:183b-28: aom tsa tri gandhe sv'a h'a /
T02TD1294E:183b-29: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD1294E:183b-30: de rab tu gnas pa'i dngos gzhi nyid yin te /
T02TD1294E:183b-31: de yang sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus dang //
T02TD1294E:183b-32: rab gnas mtshan nyid bzang po nyid //
T02TD1294E:183b-34: sku gzugs snying gar rab tu gzhug / ces pa dang /
T02TD1294E:183b-35: bsdu ba'i tshig 'dis shes par bya ste /
T02TD1294E:183b-36: ting 'dzin ye shes byin brlabs dang //
T02TD1294E:183b-37: dbang bskur ba yi rab gnas bzang //
T02TD1294E:183b-38: de la dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin ni /
T02TD1294E:183b-39: sku gzugs sa bon phyag mtshan nam //
T02TD1294E:183b-40: skad cig sogs kyis lha yi sku //
T02TD1294E:183b-41: dkyil 'khor lha rnams lugs bzhin bskyed //
T02TD1294E:183b-42: snying ga'i sa bon 'od zer gyis //
T02TD1294E:183b-43: nam mkhar bsdus la mchod cing bstim //
T02TD1294E:183b-44: de nas byin gyis brlab pa ni //
T02TD1294E:183b-45: skye mched drug dang sku gsung thugs //
T02TD1294E:184a-2: de nas dbang bskur ba ni /
T02TD1294E:184a-3: chu dang dbu rgyan nas gzung ste //
T02TD1294E:184a-4: rjes su gnang ba'i bar du sbyin //
T02TD1294E:184a-5: gzhan yang rin chen bdun la sogs //
T02TD1294E:184a-6: ci rigs par yang dbang bskur bya //
T02TD1294E:184a-7: mnga' dbul ba yang dbang der gtogs //
T02TD1294E:184a-8: de nas spyan dbye ba'i cho ga bya ste /
T02TD1294E:184a-9: gser gyi thur ma la sogs pa mar dang sbrang rtsi la bsres te /
T02TD1294E:184a-10: spyan dbye zhing 'di skad ces brjod do //
T02TD1294E:184a-11: ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis //
T02TD1294E:184a-12: 'jig rten ling tog bsal ba ltar //
T02TD1294E:184a-13: khyod kyis kyang ni mi shes pa'i //
T02TD1294E:184a-14: rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal //
T02TD1294E:184a-16: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta tsakshu tsakshu bi sho dha ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1294E:184a-17: khyad par du spyan dbye ba ni slob ma la ye shes 'bebs pa ltar 'dir bya'o //
T02TD1294E:184a-18: de nas mnga' dbul bar bya ste /
T02TD1294E:184a-19: dang por gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dbul bar bya ste /
T02TD1294E:184a-21: bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs rnam par dag pa'i gzugs brnyan la gdugs phul bas bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs rnam par dag pa ni zhal dro zhing byin che /
T02TD1294E:184a-22: 'gro ba skyob pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa yin gyi bdag po la sogs pa khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad nyin mongs pa dang /
T02TD1294E:184a-23: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa sel zhing 'gro ba skyob pa'i skal ba dang ldan par gyur cig / ji ltar sngon gyi sangs rgyas la //
T02TD1294E:184a-24: gdugs mdzes gser gyi yu bar ldan //
T02TD1294E:184a-25: phul ba de bzhin bdag 'bul gyi //
T02TD1294E:184a-26: ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol //
T02TD1294E:184a-27: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta tsha tram shri sa ma ye h'um zhes gsum mam bdun gyi bar du brjod do //
T02TD1294E:184a-28: de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang bsgre zhing sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD1294E:184a-29: rgyal mtshan yang sdar bzhin mdzad nas /
T02TD1294E:184a-30: ji ltar sngon gyi sangs rgyas la //
T02TD1294E:184a-31: bar chod bdud las rgyal ba'i rtags //
T02TD1294E:184a-32: phul ba de bzhin bdag 'bul gyi //
T02TD1294E:184a-33: ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol //
T02TD1294E:184a-34: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta dhva dza ke tu shr'i sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD1294E:184a-35: de nas 'phan dang ba dan dbul te //
T02TD1294E:184a-36: ji ltar sngon gyi sangs rgyas la //
T02TD1294E:184a-37: snyan pa'i ba dan phyogs bcur sgrogs //
T02TD1294E:184a-38: phul ba de bzhin bdag 'bul gyi //
T02TD1294E:184a-39: ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol //
T02TD1294E:184a-40: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta pa t'a ka shr'i sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD1294E:184b-0: @184b de bzhin bla re la sogs pa la yang ngo //
T02TD1294E:184b-1: yang khrus byas te mchod pa rnam pa lnga 'bul lo //
T02TD1294E:184b-3: de nas mchod pa'i tshig sngar bzhin sbyar la /
T02TD1294E:184b-4: sems can thams cad bkres skom dang /
T02TD1294E:184b-5: mu ge la sogs ba'i bskal pa las thar bar gyur cig / aom sarba ta tha' ga ta aa ha ra brum dza shr'i sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD1294E:184b-6: de nas na bza' dbul te /
T02TD1294E:184b-7: sems can thams cad gos dang bgo ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal dang gral te /
T02TD1294E:184b-8: lha'i na bza' panytsa li ka reg na bde ba gyon pa'i skal ba dang ldan par gyur cig / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta wa stra n'a na' shr'i sa ma ye h'um de nas zhal bsro bya ste /
T02TD1294E:184b-9: de yang sbyin sreg gis bya'o //
T02TD1294E:184b-10: slob ma shis par bya phyir dang //
T02TD1294E:184b-11: lha rnams tshim pa'i don du ste //
T02TD1294E:184b-12: de yang sngar bzhin cho ga ltar //
T02TD1294E:184b-13: de nas khyad par du yang nang gi sku gzugs la sogs kyi mchod pa dang ts'aru'i ston mo yang bya'o //
T02TD1294E:184b-14: de'i rjes la mchod gnas su gtad pa ni //
T02TD1294E:184b-15: khyod kyis dal gsol btab pa //
T02TD1294E:184b-16: sku gzugs dag ni khyad par du //
T02TD1294E:184b-17: ji skad gsungs bzhin rab gnas pa //
T02TD1294E:184b-18: de ni ngas byas byed du bcug / khyed kyis de ni kun tshogs par //
T02TD1294E:184b-19: ci bde bar ni mchod par gyis //
T02TD1294E:184b-20: de nas srung ma bsgo ba ni //
T02TD1294E:184b-21: bdag nyid lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bas //
T02TD1294E:184b-22: nag po chen po dgug pa dang //
T02TD1294E:184b-23: gzhug dang bcing dang dbang du bya //
T02TD1294E:184b-24: de la mchod dang gtor ma sbyin //
T02TD1294E:184b-25: de la bka' lung bsgo bya ba //
T02TD1294E:184b-26: nga yis rab gnas byas pa yi //
T02TD1294E:184b-27: gtsug lag khang la sogs pa 'di //
T02TD1294E:184b-28: ji srid gnas pa de srid du //
T02TD1294E:184b-29: bsrung zhing khyod kyis legs par skyongs //
T02TD1294E:184b-31: bka' stsal khyod kyis bsrung ba dang //
T02TD1294E:184b-32: ston pa'i bka' dang slob dpon gyi //
T02TD1294E:184b-33: bka' lung bsgo ba legs par srungs //
T02TD1294E:184b-34: de nas bzod gsol bya ste /
T02TD1294E:184b-35: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang lha rnams dang //
T02TD1294E:184b-36: de sras tshangs sogs lha tshogs kun //
T02TD1294E:184b-37: gang zhig cho ga byas pa ni //
T02TD1294E:184b-38: nongs gyur de dag bzod mdzad rigs //
T02TD1294E:184b-39: de nas gshegs gsol byed 'dod na /
T02TD1294E:184b-40: 'di tsam brjod par bya ba ste //
T02TD1294E:184b-41: spyin bdag rnams la zhi ba dang //
T02TD1294E:184b-42: bde legs chen po kun mdzad par //
T02TD1294E:184b-43: sangs rgyas yul ku gshegs nas kyang //
T02TD1294E:185a-2: de nas byin brlabs brtan pa brjod //
T02TD1294E:185a-4: bskal ba rgya las lhag gnas shing //
T02TD1294E:185a-5: sa dang me dang chu dang ni //
T02TD1294E:185a-6: rlung las lha rnams kun gyis srungs //
T02TD1294E:185a-7: slob spon slob mar bcas pa dang //
T02TD1294E:185a-8: bu dang tsha bo rnams 'phel te //
T02TD1294E:185a-9: rab dga' yid bder gyur nas ni //
T02TD1294E:185a-10: rang gnas bzang por rtag tu bzhugs //
T02TD1294E:185a-11: rab gnas spyi yi shes byas na //
T02TD1294E:185a-12: gal te glegs bam ras ris sogs //
T02TD1294E:185a-13: yin na gzhan las gsungs pa bzhin //
T02TD1294E:185a-14: yig 'brur sgyur dang khrus la sogs //
T02TD1294E:185a-15: sngags la sogs pa ci rigs bya //
T02TD1294E:185a-16: gzhung mngas dogs nas 'dir ma brjod //
T02TD1294E:185a-17: de rdzes gzhung rdzogs tshigs bcad brjod //
T02TD1294E:185a-18: gang gis 'di rtsom pa yang bdag ming ni //
T02TD1294E:185a-19: mi mthun phyogs kyis thub dka' mi bskyod la //
T02TD1294E:185a-20: mtha' na rdo rje ldan pas btsas pa'i ming //
T02TD1294E:185a-21: ma btsas grags pas bsod nams kun la khyab //
T02TD1294E:185a-22: mtha' na rgyal mtshan ldan pas snyan pa'i gsung //
T02TD1294E:185a-23: gang brtsams gzhung de rab tu grub pa yang //
T02TD1294E:185a-24: sgrub ba po yi lag tu bya ba yang //
T02TD1294E:185a-25: mtha' ru blang ba ldan pas don kun rdzogs //
T02TD1294E:185a-26: tshigs bcad rkyang ba rnams spras rim pa la //
T02TD1294E:185a-27: mtha' na zhes bya ldan pas grags chen po //
T02TD1294E:185a-28: gang ltar don de rab tu rdzogs pa yang //
T02TD1294E:185a-29: mngon rtogs sgrub thabs dbang dang rab gnas yin //
T02TD1294E:185a-30: sgrub thabs dang mthun bla ma'i mngon rtogs la //
T02TD1294E:185a-31: mtha' ru sgrub pa dang ldan dkyil 'khor cho ga rdzogs //
T02TD1294E:185a-32: dri ma dag cing nus 'jog dbang la yang //
T02TD1294E:185a-33: mtha' ru rab gnas ldan pas gzhan don rdzogs //
T02TD1294E:185a-34: gang phyir sbyin pa'i 'bras bu 'grub pa yang //
T02TD1294E:185a-35: phrin las dngos grub rang gzhan don du yin //
T02TD1294E:185a-36: de las cung zhig go bzlog 'di shes bya //
T02TD1294E:185a-37: bsten pa mngon rtogs rim par rang don las //
T02TD1294E:185a-38: mtha' nas gzhan don ldan pas sgrub pa'i don //
T02TD1294E:185a-39: dbang bskur ba las 'byung ba'i dngos grub la //
T02TD1294E:185a-40: phrin las ldan pas rab gnas bzang po yin //
T02TD1294E:185a-41: bod kyi lo ts'a bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyis //
T02TD1294E:185a-42: gzhung dag las ni gsungs pa yin mod kyang //
T02TD1294E:185a-43: bla mas rang la rang gis gzhan la ste //
T02TD1294E:185a-44: mdzad pa'i rim pa bsdus shing legs par bsgyur //
